Description of incident: "QVC uses technology to track activities that occur on its website, and the tracking technology sends data to companies that provide services to QVC. We recently learned that as the result of a technical setting, instead of sending anonymous data, the tracking technology unintentionally sent limited information about website visitors to those online marketing partners. While the information was sent securely, neither QVC nor the online marketing partners intended for this data to be sent."The information compromised included email addresses and passwords used to access QVC accounts. More information: https://oag.ca.gov/ecrime/databreach/reports/sb24-64962
